com.busit.util

Interface Sql


  • public interface Sql

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long delete(String sql)
      Perform a DELETE statement on the database.
      String escape(String text)
      Escapes some text such that it can be used safely in sql statements.
      long insert(String sql)
      Perform an INSERT statement on the database.
      Any select(String sql)
      Perform a SELECT statement on the database.
      Any selectOne(String sql)
      Perform a SELECT statement on the database expecting a single row in return.
      long update(String sql)
      Perform an UPDATE statement on the database.

    • Method Detail

      • select

        Any select(String sql)
        Perform a SELECT statement on the database.
        Parameters:
        sql - the sql query
        Returns:
        the result of the query in the form of an array (rows) of key/value pairs (column/value), if no result, an empty array is returned

      • selectOne

        Any selectOne(String sql)
        Perform a SELECT statement on the database expecting a single row in return.
        Parameters:
        sql - the sql query
        Returns:
        the result of the query in the form key/value pairs (column/value), if no result, null is returned

      • insert

        long insert(String sql)
        Perform an INSERT statement on the database.
        Parameters:
        sql - the sql query
        Returns:
        the newly inserted primary key

      • update

        long update(String sql)
        Perform an UPDATE statement on the database.
        Parameters:
        sql - the sql query
        Returns:
        the number of rows affected

      • delete

        long delete(String sql)
        Perform a DELETE statement on the database.
        Parameters:
        sql - the sql query
        Returns:
        the number of rows affected

      • escape

        String escape(String text)
        Escapes some text such that it can be used safely in sql statements.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be escaped
        Returns:
        properly escaped sql-safe text
